name: Nightwards, Heartwards (Victor Ojuel)
description:
Explore your inner world.

Roam a weird and allegorical wasteland.

Travel towards your Mind or your Heart, explore far towards Day or Night.

Find fellow travelers and establish links with them. Change your mood and mental state to face the challenges and quests of life. Settle and discover your ultimate fate.

Programming by Dustin Connor, art by Florencia Minuzzi (Tea-Powered Games), writing by Víctor Ojuel. Created in 3 days for Ludum Dare 38.

Learn more about Nightwards, Heartwards here.
